STUDIO_PEREBOR_ABOUT: Creating websites, e-commerce shops, promo pages, intranet apps, mobile apps, logos, corporate identities and stuff:
PORTFOLIO_PEREBOR: «Perebor Studio» — the web studio site (combo! Shoemaker goes in boots!)
PORTFOLIO_WHOSHOE: «Who Shoe?» — an e-commerce shoes shop
PORTFOLIO_FMG: «Food Market Group» — online‑showcase for the food company
PORTFOLIO_FTD: «Feed the devs» — an app to rate developers’ contributions to Github projects (idea and prototype by Stepan Suvorov)
PORTFOLIO_JUSTPRIVAT: «Justprivat» — information website for a law firm
PORTFOLIO_AUTOLIGHTS: «Lamp Repair» — a landing page for a car repair shop
PORTFOLIO_XMAS: «Xmas Beard» — an Android Christmas game. We designed a logo and an interface for the game
PORTFOLIO_CAREERSTUDIO: Landing page and a blog for the «Career studio», where trainers help discover your talents and raise a successful career
PORTFOLIO_PEOPLEINBUSINESS: A website for «People in Business», who help companies set up communication and business process, involving employees’ resources at full capacity
STUDIO_PEREBOR_REFERENCE: Perebor stands for “Generate” in Russian. Solvable problems can always be solved by the “Generate and test” method as a simplest. Perebor Studio will create the right tool for you, even if it will require to generate and test a lot of options.
